data.comment: Fabinho (Ceara) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The big names in today's match at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos have now been confirmed.
The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Botafogo with the kick-off.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Botafogo.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
In the minute 5, Ceara have been awarded a corner by Diego Pombo Lopez.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro Botafogo attack through Matheus Babi. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 7, Ceara have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 10, Botafogo drives forward and Matheus Babi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Botafogo in their own half.
Diego Pombo Lopez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 13, Free kick Ceara.
Bruno Nazario for Botafogo has been booked by Diego Pombo Lopez and receives a first yellow card.
An attacking Botafogo player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 16, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead thanks to a penalty from Keisuke Honda.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Ceara close to the penalty box.
Ceara's Vinicius Goes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 18, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Diego Pombo Lopez awards Ceara a goal kick.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 21, Throw-in Ceara.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Ceara at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
In the minute 23, Cleber Bomfim gets an equalizer for Ceara. The score is now 1-1.
Great play from Leo Chu to set up the goal.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
In the minute 28, Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Goal! Botafogo have taken a 2-1 lead courtesy of a header from Matheus Babi.
Bruno Nazario instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 30, Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ceara needs to be cautious. Botafogo have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
In the minute 31, Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Goal kick for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
In the minute 33, Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Botafogo.
Botafogo are awarded a penalty at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos. Victor Luis takes the kick ... But misses!
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 39, Botafogo to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Botafogo in Rio de Janeiro.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a throw-in for Botafogo, close to Ceara's area.
In the minute 41, Botafogo pushes forward through Matheus Babi, whose finish on goal is saved.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Botafogo.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a Botafogo throw-in in Ceara's half.
In the minute 43, Botafogo are pushing forward but Caio Alexandre's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, In Rio de Janeiro Ceara drive forward through Eduardo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 7 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Diego Pombo Lopez blows to end the first-half.
Luiz Otavio (Ceara) has received a first yellow card.
Attention is being given to Botafogoâ€™s Alexander Lecaros and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 45, It seems as if Alexander Lecaros is unable to continue. Kelvin replaces him for the home team.
The second-half is underway. Ceara with the kick-off.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
In the minute 46, Diego Pombo Lopez signals a Ceara throw-in in Botafogo's half.
Can Ceara capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Botafogo's half?
In the minute 46, Leandro Carvalho is on a sub for Vinicius Lima for Ceara.
Ceara make their second substitution with Rick Lima replacing Leo Chu.
Diego Pombo Lopez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 48, Cleber Bomfim of Ceara gets in a strike, but is off target.
Diego Pombo Lopez awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Ceara in the half of Botafogo.
Throw-in Botafogo.
Throw-in for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
In the minute 50, Matheus Babi of Botafogo is pulled up for offside.
Goal! Ceara go level at 2-2 through Leandro Carvalho in Rio de Janeiro.
That's a fine assist from Vinicius Goes.
Free kick in a good position for Ceara!
In the minute 54, Play has been interrupted briefly in Rio de Janeiro to check on Victor Luis, who is grimacing with pain.
At Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos, Marcelo Benevenuto for the home team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
In the minute 55, Ceara's Vinicius Goes breaks free at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Botafogo have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Botafogo.
In the minute 56, Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Throw-in for Botafogo close to the penalty box.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 57, Botafogo's Victor Luis is back in action after a slight knock.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Matheus Babi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Botafogo.
In the minute 59, Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Ceara.
Keisuke Honda (Botafogo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ceara will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Botafogo.
In the minute 60, Ceara's Tiago has been booked in Rio de Janeiro.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Diego Pombo Lopez.
Botafogo push upfield and Kanu gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Ceara defence.
In the minute 63, Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Botafogo's Warley misses with an attempt on goal.
Ceara have a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Free kick Botafogo.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Botafogo to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
In the minute 68, Diego Pombo Lopez signals a Ceara throw-in in Botafogo's half.
Ceara have a dangerous throw-in.
Charles for Ceara drives towards goal at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 70, Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Botafogo in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Botafogo in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 71, Victor Luis for the home team is judged to be offside.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 72, Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ceara are in shooting range from this free kick.
Cleber Bomfim for Ceara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 74, Diego Pombo Lopez awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Free kick Ceara.
Throw-in for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
In the minute 76, Guto Ferreira (Ceara) is making a third substitution, with Wescley replacing Vinicius Goes.
The away team replace Fabinho with Fernando Sobral.
Jose Welison is replacing Keisuke Honda for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
In the minute 77, Ivan Angulo is replacing Warley for the home team.
Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Botafogo.
Throw-in Ceara.
In the minute 79, Goal kick for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Ceara.
Diego Pombo Lopez awards the away team a throw-in.
Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 83, Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Botafogo's half?
Luiz Otavio has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
In the minute 87, At Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos, Leandro Carvalho has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Eduardo Brock is on a sub for Leandro Carvalho for Ceara.
The home team replace Caio Alexandre with Pedro Raul.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Ceara.
The fourth official's board shows 6 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Ceara.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Matheus Babi of Botafogo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Botafogo just outside Ceara's area.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Diego Pombo Lopez.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
7 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-2.
Wescley for Ceara has been booked by Diego Pombo Lopez and receives a first yellow card.
Ivan Angulo is booked for the home team.
Ivan Angulo (Botafogo) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
